name: Pie Dough Recipe
description: A flaky, all-butter pie dough recipe perfect for both sweet and savory pies.

ingredients.item: 2 1/2 sticks (10 ounces; 280 grams) unsalted butter, cut into 1/4-inch pats

instructions: Combine two thirds of flour with sugar and salt in the bowl of a food processor.
Spread butter chunks evenly over surface.
Pulse until no dry flour remains and dough just begins to collect in clumps, about 25 short pulses.
Use a rubber spatula to spread the dough evenly around the bowl of the food processor.
Sprinkle with remaining flour and pulse until dough is just barely broken up, about 5 short pulses.
Transfer dough to a large bowl.
Using a rubber spatula, fold and press dough until it comes together into a ball.
Form each half into a 4-inch disk.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before rolling and baking.
